meta.subtitulo: Creation a Single Page Application for a To Do list

resumo.p: This project consists in the creation of single page application for a To Do lists.
The data layer will be served with json-server. The dataset will begin as an empty list of tasks.
The application will be created with Node.js.
The application will only have one page that is divided in two main sections:
The task is composed by: Deadline, Description ,Responsible, Category.
After being added, the task will be on the ToDo list.
In the lists, each task display the attributes and there's three actions related to which one.
When the task is marked as done/undone, it will be moved to the other list.
When the task is deleted, it will be removed from the list.
When the task is edited, the form will be filled with the task's attributes and the user can change them.
When the user clicks on the button "Filter", the list will be filtered by the category selected.
Each action will be a POST method, after the response, the page will be reloaded, so the changes take effect.
